metadata.name: Lore üìñ: First Amphoraüè∫
metadata.description:
--A story based on a world where I build a fashion house with second hand physical clothes for a digital first future-- 

Paha arranged the ti leaves and fabric on the Pedestal between the shattered clay piecesüçÉ This simple island tradition could summon a mystical restoring influence, but no magic had ever worked for him. Would it now? After all the searching, it was hard to still believe.

Then SOMETHING happenedü™Ñ The clay pieces glowed green. They scraped across the surface of the Pedestal towards the leaves. Curved lines of gold shimmer projected upwards like scaffolding to outline the legendary artifactüè∫

The broken clay snapped up into place to fill the bright scaffolding. As the First Amphora stitched itself up, Paha saw that it was not simply just clay being reformed.

The First Amphora formed a patched and mended fusion of materials ü™° The jug was a cohesive bright green and pink mix of clay, wood, and fabric. Spanning the middle of the First Amphora repeated the symbol Paha had seen all throughout the Island. The symbol of a plant reaching up towards the sun.üåÖ
